name: slink
description: Slink is a self-hosted link shortener and micro-landing-page generator. It supports custom domains, analytics, and a straightforward management UI.
features: URL shortening: Creates short links with custom or auto-generated slugs.
Landing pages: Builds micro-landing pages with multiple links and content blocks.
Click analytics: Tracks visits, referrers, devices, and geographic locations.
Custom domains: Uses your own domains for branded short links.
QR codes: Generates QR codes for each short link automatically.
Link expiration: Sets automatic expiration dates for temporary links.
Password protection: Secures links with passwords for restricted access.
A/B testing: Creates multiple destinations and rotates traffic for testing.
UTM parameters: Adds tracking parameters automatically for campaign analytics.
API access: Creates and manages links programmatically via REST API.
Team collaboration: Shares link management across team members with permissions.
Export data: Downloads analytics and link data for external analysis.
